verses.verse: Now when<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> was born<WG1080> in<WG1722> Bethlehem<WG965> of Judea<WG2449> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of Herod<WG2264> the king<WG935>, behold<WG2400>, there came<WG3854> wise men<WG3097> from<WG575> the east<WG395> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2414>,

Saying<WG3004>, Where<WG4226> is<WG2076> he<WG3588> that is born<WG5088> King<WG935> of the Jews<WG2453>? For<WG1063> we have seen<WG1492> his<WG846> star<WG792> in<WG1722> the east<WG395>, and<WG2532> have come<WG2064> to worship<WG4352> him<WG846>.
When<WG1161> Herod<WG2264> the king<WG935> had heard<WG191> these things<WG5015>, he was troubled, and<WG2532> all<WG3956> Jerusalem<WG2414> with<WG3326> him<WG846>.

And when<WG2532> he had gathered<WG4863> all<WG3956> the chief priests<WG749> and<WG2532> scribes<WG1122> of the people<WG2992> together<WG4863>, he demanded<WG4441> of<WG3844> them<WG846> where<WG4226> Christ<WG5547> would be born<WG1080>.
And<WG1161> they said<WG2036> to him<WG846>, In<WG1722> Bethlehem<WG965> of Judea<WG2449>: for<WG1063> thus<WG3779> it is written<WG1125> by<WG1223> the prophet<WG4396>,

And<WG2532> you<WG4771> Bethlehem<WG965>, in the land<WG1093> of Judah<WG2448>, are<WG1488> not<WG3760> the least<WG1646> among<WG1722> the princes<WG2232> of Judah<WG2448>: for<WG1063> out of<WG1537> you<WG4675> shall come<WG1831> a Governor<WG2233>, that<WG3748> shall rule<WG4165> my<WG3450> people<WG2992> Israel<WG2474>.

Then<WG5119> Herod<WG2264>, when he had<WG2564> privately<WG2977> called<WG2564> the wise men<WG3097>, inquired<WG198> of<WG3844> them<WG846> diligently<WG198> what time<WG5550> the star<WG792> appeared<WG5316>.

And<WG2532> he sent<WG3992> them<WG846> to<WG1519> Bethlehem<WG965>, and said<WG2036>, Go<WG4198> and search<WG1833> diligently<WG199> for<WG4012> the young child<WG3813>; and<WG1161> when<WG1875> you have found<WG2147> him<WG518>, bring me<WG3427> word again<WG518>, that<WG3704> I<WG2504> may come<WG2064> and worship<WG4352> him<WG846> also<WG2504>.

When<WG1161> they had heard<WG191> the king<WG935>, they departed<WG4198>; and<WG2532>, behold<WG2400>, the star<WG792>, which<WG3739> they saw<WG1492> in<WG1722> the east<WG395>, went before<WG4254> them<WG846>, until<WG2193> it came<WG2064> and stood<WG2476> over<WG1883> where<WG3757> the young child<WG3813> was<WG2258>.
When<WG1161> they saw<WG1492> the star<WG792>, they rejoiced<WG5463> with exceedingly<WG4970> great<WG3173> joy<WG5479>.

And<WG2532> when they had come<WG2064> into<WG1519> the house<WG3614>, they saw<WG2147> the young child<WG3813> with<WG3326> Mary<WG3137> his<WG846> mother<WG3384>, and<WG2532> fell down<WG4098>, and worshiped<WG4352> him<WG846>: and when<WG2532> they had opened<WG455> their<WG846> treasures<WG2344>, they presented<WG4374> to him<WG846> gifts<WG1435>; gold<WG5557>, and<WG2532> frankincense<WG3030>, and<WG2532> myrrh<WG4666>.

And<WG2532> being warned by God<WG5537> in<WG2596> a dream<WG3677> that they should<WG344> not<WG3361> return<WG344> to<WG4314> Herod<WG2264>, they departed<WG402> into<WG1519> their own<WG846> country<WG5561><WG99999> another<WG243> way<WG3598>.

And when<WG1161> they<WG846> had departed<WG402>, behold<WG2400>, the angel<WG32> of the Lord<WG2962> appeared<WG5316> to Joseph<WG2501> in<WG2596> a dream<WG3677>, saying<WG3004>, Arise<WG1453>, and take<WG3880> the young child<WG3813> and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother<WG3384>, and<WG2532> flee<WG5343> into<WG1519> Egypt<WG125>, and<WG2532> stay<WG2468> there<WG1563> until<WG2193><WG99999> I bring<WG2036> you<WG4671> word<WG2036>: for<WG1063> Herod<WG2264> will<WG3195> seek<WG2212> the young child<WG3813> to destroy<WG622> him<WG846>.
When<WG1161> he arose<WG1453>, he took<WG3880> the young child<WG3813> and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother<WG3384> by night<WG3571>, and<WG2532> departed<WG402> into<WG1519> Egypt<WG125>:

And<WG2532> was<WG2258> there<WG1563> until<WG2193> the death<WG5054> of Herod<WG2264>: that<WG2443> it might be fulfilled<WG4137> which was spoken<WG4483> of<WG5259> the Lord<WG2962> by<WG1223> the prophet<WG4396>, saying<WG3004>, Out of<WG1537> Egypt<WG125> have I called<WG2564> my<WG3450> son<WG5207>.

Then<WG5119> Herod<WG2264>, when he saw<WG1492> that<WG3754> he was mocked<WG1702> by<WG5259> the wise men<WG3097>, was<WG2373> exceedingly<WG3029> angry<WG2373>, and<WG2532> sent forth<WG649>, and killed<WG337> all<WG3956> the sons<WG3816> that were<WG3588> in<WG1722> Bethlehem<WG965>, and<WG2532> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> the coasts<WG3725> there<WG846>, from<WG575> two years old<WG1332> and<WG2532> under<WG2736>, according to<WG2596> the time<WG5550> which<WG3739> he had diligently inquired<WG198> of<WG3844> the wise men<WG3097>.
Then<WG5119> was fulfilled<WG4137> that which was spoken<WG4483> by<WG5259> Jeremiah<WG2408> the prophet<WG4396>, saying<WG3004>,

In<WG1722> Ramah<WG4471> was there<WG191> a voice<WG5456> heard<WG191>, lamentation<WG2355>, and<WG2532> weeping<WG2805>, and<WG2532> great<WG4183> mourning<WG3602>, Rachel<WG4478> weeping<WG2799> for her<WG846> sons<WG5043>, and<WG2532> would<WG2309> not<WG3756> be comforted<WG3870>, because<WG3754> they are<WG1526> not<WG3756>.
But when<WG1161> Herod<WG2264> was dead<WG5053>, behold<WG2400>, an angel<WG32> of the Lord<WG2962> appeared<WG5316> in<WG2596> a dream<WG3677> to Joseph<WG2501> in<WG1722> Egypt<WG125>,

Saying<WG3004>, Arise<WG1453>, and take<WG3880> the young child<WG3813> and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother<WG3384>, and<WG2532> go<WG4198> into<WG1519> the land<WG1093> of Israel<WG2474>: for<WG1063> they are dead<WG2348> which<WG3588> sought<WG2212> the young child<WG3813>'s life<WG5590>.
And<WG1161> he arose<WG1453>, and took<WG3880> the young child<WG3813> and<WG2532> his<WG846> mother<WG3384>, and<WG2532> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> the land<WG1093> of Israel<WG2474>.

But<WG1161> when he heard<WG191> that<WG3754> Archelaus<WG745> did reign<WG936> in<WG1909> Judea<WG2449> in the room of<WG473> his<WG846> father<WG3962> Herod<WG2264>, he was afraid<WG5399> to go<WG565> there<WG1563>: and<WG1161>, being warned of God<WG5537> in<WG2596> a dream<WG3677>, he turned aside<WG402> into<WG1519> the parts<WG3313> of Galilee<WG1056>:

And<WG2532> he came<WG2064> and lived<WG2730> in<WG1519> a city<WG4172> called<WG3004> Nazareth<WG3478>: that<WG3704> it might be fulfilled<WG4137> which<WG3588> was spoken<WG4483> by<WG1223> the prophets<WG3754>, He shall be called<WG2564> a Nazarene<WG3480>.
